mapper.select: select htb_no ,htb_brkfPrice ,htb_totalPrice ,htb_chkIn ,htb_chkOut ,date_format(htb_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as fmt_htb_date ,(case when DATE(htb_chkIn) <= DATE(now()) then 'Y' else 'N' end) as bookingComple ,(select htl_name from hotel where htl_no = htb.htl_no) as htl_name ,(select hrm_name from htlRoom where hrm_no = htb.hrm_no ) as hrm_name ,(select concat(hfl_path, hfl_name) from hcamFile where hfl_kubun = 'htl' and kubun_no = htb.htl_no limit 1) file_path from htlBooking htb where mem_no = #{mem_no} order by htb_chkIn desc;

select cbk_no ,cbk_rlpCarPrice ,cbk_totalPrice ,cbk_chkInDate ,cbk_chkOutDate ,cbk_chkInTime ,cbk_chkOutTime ,DATE_FORMAT(cbk_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as fmt_cbk_date ,(case when concat(cbk_chkInDate,cbk_chkInTime) <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i') then 'Y' else 'N' end) as bookingComple ,(select car_name from rentAcar where car_no = cbk.car_no) as car_name ,(select car_kubun from rentAcar where car_no = cbk.car_no) as car_kubun ,(select car_location from rentAcar where car_no = cbk.car_no) as car_location ,(select car_branch from rentAcar where car_no = cbk.car_no) as car_branch ,(select car_fuelKubun from rentAcar where car_no = cbk.car_no) as car_fuelKubun ,(select concat(hfl_path, hfl_name) from hcamFile where hfl_kubun = 'car' and kubun_no = cbk.car_no limit 1) file_path from racBooking cbk where mem_no = #{mem_no} order by cbk_chkInDate desc, cbk_chkInTime desc;

select FORMAT(pnt_balance,0) as pnt_balance ,(select ifnull(FORMAT(sum(phs_historyAmt),0),0) from pntHistory where pnt_no = pnt.pnt_no and phs_kind = 'PNT01001') as depo_pnt ,FORMAT((select ifnull(sum(phs_historyAmt),0) from pntHistory where pnt_no = pnt.pnt_no and phs_kind = 'PNT01002') - (select ifnull(sum(phs_historyAmt),0) from pntHistory where pnt_no = pnt.pnt_no and phs_kind = 'PNT01004'),0) as save_pnt ,FORMAT((select ifnull(sum(phs_historyAmt),0) from pntHistory where pnt_no = pnt.pnt_no and phs_kind = 'PNT01003') - (select ifnull(sum(phs_historyAmt),0) from pntHistory where pnt_no = pnt.pnt_no and phs_kind = 'PNT01005'),0) as use_pnt from hcamPoint pnt where pnt_no = #{pnt_no};
select phs_kind ,phs_historyAmt ,phs_comment ,date_format(phs_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as phs_date from pntHistory where pnt_no = #{pnt_no} order by phs_no desc;

select cbk_no from racBooking where car_no = #{car_no} and cbk_chkInDate = #{cbk_chkInDate} and cbk_chkOutDate = #{cbk_chkOutDate} and cbk_chkInTime = #{cbk_chkInTime} and cbk_chkOutTime = #{cbk_chkOutTime} and cbk_rentTerm = #{cbk_rentTerm};
mapper.insert: insert into racBooking(car_no, mem_no, cbk_rlpName, cbk_rlpEmail, cbk_rlpNation, cbk_rlpPhone, cbk_chkInDate, cbk_chkOutDate, cbk_chkInTime, cbk_chkOutTime, cbk_rentTerm, cbk_rlpCarPrice, cbk_totalPrice) values(#{car_no}, #{mem_no}, #{cbk_rlpName}, #{cbk_rlpEmail}, #{cbk_rlpNation}, #{cbk_rlpPhone}, #{cbk_chkInDate}, #{cbk_chkOutDate}, #{cbk_chkInTime}, #{cbk_chkOutTime}, #{cbk_rentTerm}, #{cbk_rlpCarPrice}, #{cbk_totalPrice});
mapper.select: select cbk_no, car_no, mem_no, cbk_rlpName, cbk_rlpEmail, cbk_rlpNation, cbk_rlpPhone, cbk_chkInDate, cbk_chkOutDate , cbk_chkInTime, cbk_chkOutTime, cbk_rentTerm, cbk_rlpCarPrice, cbk_totalPrice, date_format(cbk_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as cbk_date from racBooking where cbk_no = #{cbk_no};

select 'day' as date_kubun ,kubun ,date_format(booking_date, '%Y') as fmt_year ,date_format(booking_date, '%m') as fmt_month ,date_format(booking_date, '%m/%d') as fmt_date ,cast(count(*) as char(10)) as cnt from (select 'hotel' as kubun ,htb_date as booking_date from hotel htl ,htlBooking htb where htl.htl_no = htb.htl_no and htl.mgr_no = #{mgr_no} union all select 'car' as kubun ,cbk_date as booking_date from rentAcar car ,racBooking rbk where car.car_no = rbk.car_no and car.mgr_no = #{mgr_no} ) as tab group by day(booking_date) order by booking_date ;
